p:
FLU-v, developed by PepTcell (trading as SEEK), is a peptide vaccine derived from conserved regions of internal proteins aiming to provide a broadly protective immune response against influenza A and B through viral clearance by cytotoxic T cell release of pro-inflammatory cytokines as well as perforin and granzyme. It has demonstrated efficacy in animals
19 and safety and immunogenicity in Phase I and Phase Ib trials, the latter of which demonstrated cellular immune responses to FLU-v correlated with reduction of viral shedding and reduced symptoms after H3N2 influenza challenge
20, 21 .
